Articles.Content:
You guys really should give us the option to add a thread prefix on the mobile version, it causes a lot of problems when creating threads like this that require me to select one of the 2.

And the desktop version is just big.

It's a known problem but out of our hands I believe. This is a missing feature in the forum's software (vBulletin)

Edit:

On further investigation it's actually a bug, the data for the prefixes isn't loaded properly. Even when I force the template to display the prefix options it will give an empty list.

Edit 2:

This is apparently a known problem for vBulletin and happens when more than one prefix set per forum is available. Currently we can't fix it.

Edited June 8, 2014 by KasperVld
